page.title: 06Leiston Fire Station.
page.content: Leiston has a fire station with one fire engine. If you need it you dial 999 and it doesn,t cost you any money. There are 10 firemen who train on every Monday evening and they have to carry a bleeper everywhere they go even while they are in bed.If it bleeps they rush to the fire station and the first 6 to get there go on the fire engine.Every man has to wear a helmet,thigh-boots, waterproof leggings, fire proof jacket and trousers. Including equipement the fire engine cost about 50,000 pounds.It goes up to 70mph and blows a loud siren.On it are hoses, long ladders,lots of water,foam and tools. Leiston fire engine is very important because if there was an emergency at Sizewell Power Station, it would be needed very quickly.
